attributes.action: Scrap the TV license fee or restrict the TV license fee to func BBC1/BBC2 and BBC radio stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The TV license fee is too high.  We are offered more choice of channels and therefore spend less time watching BBC channels but we are paying more for a TV license.  Its time to scrap the license fee or at least restrict the BBC funding to only BBC1/BBC2 and BBC radio stations.  The BBC should fund its extra stations through commercial ventures and advertising.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
